## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7838b0f51882af6cd99758551eec942e5c2abcd214ebe7c1e8b3c59dbece4224)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'teamstelemetry' @ 9.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
